titleStmt.title: An answer to Dr. Sherlock's examination of the Oxford decree in a letter from a member of that university to his friend in London.
titleStmt.author: Wallis, John, 1616-1703.

editionStmt.edition: The second edition, corrected and inlarged.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
